chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
n: nat
u2: nat -> T
u1: nat -> T

Goal:
(forall i : nat, (i < n)%nat -> u1 i = u2 i) <-> mk_Tn n u1 = mk_Tn n u2

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
mk_Tn : forall n0 : nat, (nat -> ?T) -> Tn n0 ?T where ?T : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- Type]
coeff_Tn_ext : forall (x1 x2 : ?T) (v1 v2 : Tn ?n ?T), v1 = v2 < -> (forall i : nat, (i < ?n)%nat -> coeff_Tn x1 v1 i = coeff_Tn x2 v2 i) where ?T : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- nat]
coeff_Tn_bij : forall (x0 : ?T) (u : nat -> ?T) (i : nat), (i < ?n)%nat -> coeff_Tn x0 (mk_Tn ?n u) i = u i where ?T : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- nat]
mk_Tn_bij : forall (x0 : ?T) (v : Tn ?n ?T), mk_Tn ?n (coeff_Tn x0 v) = v where ?T : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- Type] ?n : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : (?p < ?n)%nat, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- nat] ?n : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : Fin.t ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- nat]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p q : Fin.t ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p = q where ?n : [T : Type n : nat u1 : nat -> T u2 : nat -> T |- nat]
List.NoDup_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i < length l)%nat -> List.nth_error l i = List.nth_error l j -> i = j)
ordered_Rlist = fun l : Rlist => forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> pos_Rl l i <= pos_Rl l (S i) : Rlist -> Prop
List.NoDup_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i < length l)%nat -> (j < length l)%nat -> List.nth i l d = List.nth j l d -> i = j)
adapted_couple_opt = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => adapted_couple f a b l lf /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength lf))%nat -> pos_Rl lf i <> pos_Rl lf (S i) \/ f (pos_Rl l (S i)) <> pos_Rl lf i) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> pos_Rl l i <> pos_Rl l (S i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
RList_P6 : forall l : Rlist, ordered_Rlist l < -> (forall i j : nat, (i <= j)%nat -> (j < Rlength l)%nat -> pos_Rl l i <= pos_Rl l j)
Nat.min_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ f n m = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ f n m = m) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.min n m
Nat.max_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ f n m = m \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ f n m = n) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.max n m
coeff_Tn = fix coeff_Tn (T : Type) (n : nat) (x0 : T) {struct n} : Tn n T -> nat -> T := match n as n0 return (Tn n0 T -> nat -> T) with | 0%nat => fun (_ : Tn 0 T) (_ : nat) => x0 | S n' => fun (v : Tn (S n') T) (i : nat) => match i with | 0%nat => fst v | S i0 => coeff_Tn T n' x0 (snd v) i0 end end : forall (T : Type) (n : nat), T -> Tn n T -> nat -> T Arguments T, n are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope _ _ nat_scope]
Nat.rs'_rs'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, (z <= n)%nat -> (forall m : nat, (z <= m)%nat -> (m < n)%nat -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, (z <= m)%nat -> (m < n)%nat -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, (z <= m)%nat -> (m < S n)%nat -> A m)
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | (i < m)%nat} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | (i < n0)%nat} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => (i < S j)%nat) 0%nat (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => (i0 < S n0)%nat) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | (i < m)%nat} Argument m is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope _]
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
Nat.order_induction_0 : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, (0 <= n)%nat -> A n -> A (S n)) -> (forall n : nat, (n < 0)%nat -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Nat.mul_cancel_l : forall n m p : nat, p <> 0%nat -> (p * n)%nat = (p * m)%nat < -> n = m
Nat.succ_pred_pos : forall n : nat, (0 < n)%nat -> S (Nat.pred n) = n
S_pred_pos : forall n : nat, (0 < n)%nat -> n = S (Init.Nat.pred n)
Nat.lt_succ_pred : forall z n : nat, (z < n)%nat -> S (Nat.pred n) = n
S_pred : forall n m : nat, (m < n)%nat -> n = S (Init.Nat.pred n)
gt = fun n m : nat => (m < n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
ge = fun n m : nat => (m <= n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Nat.min_unicity : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ p = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ p = m -> p = Nat.min n m
Nat.max_unicity : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ p = m \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ p = n -> p = Nat.max n m
eq_add_S : forall n m : nat, S n = S m -> n = m
Nat.lt_exists_pred : forall z n : nat, (z < n)%nat -> exists k : nat, n = S k /\ (z <= k)%nat
Nat.mul_lt_pred : forall p q n m : nat, S p = q -> (p * n < p * m)%nat < -> (q * n + m < q * m + n)%nat
pos_Rl = fix pos_Rl (l : Rlist) (i : nat) {struct l} : R := match l with | nil => 0 | cons a l' => match i with | 0%nat => a | S i' => pos_Rl l' i' end end : Rlist -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope]
minus_Sn_m : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> S (n - m) = (S n - m)%nat
lt = fun n m : nat => (S n <= m)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Nat.land_ones_low : forall a n : nat, (Nat.log2 a < n)%nat -> Nat.land a (Nat.ones n) = a
Nat.succ_pred : forall n : nat, n <> 0%nat -> S (Nat.pred n) = n
Nat.mul_pos_cancel_l : forall n m : nat, (0 < n)%nat -> (0 < n * m)%nat < -> (0 < m)%nat
Nat.mul_pos_cancel_r : forall n m : nat, (0 < m)%nat -> (0 < n * m)%nat < -> (0 < n)%nat
Ascii.nat_ascii_embedding : forall n : nat, (n < 256)%nat -> Ascii.nat_of_ascii (Ascii.ascii_of_nat n) = n

```coq
split.
- intros H i Hn. apply (@coeff_Tn_ext (u1 i) (u2 i) (mk_Tn n u1) (mk_Tn n u2)).
  + apply mk_Tn_bij.
  + exact Hn.
- intros H i Hn. apply (@coeff_Tn_ext (u2 i) (u1 i) (mk_Tn n u2) (mk_Tn n u1)).
  + apply mk_Tn_bij.
  + exact Hn.
Qed.
```
